name: Refrigerator Samsung Smart Conversion Black (RS66A8100B1/WT)
origAbout: Expand your storage with the Samsung SpaceMax™ series of refrigerators. With a maximum capacity, minimalist sleek design and an All-around Cooling system that chills to perfection, food storage never looked so smart. Twin Cooling Plus™: 2 separate cooling systems, keep food fresher and longer. Smart Conversion: Easy convert from freezer to fridge, provides flexible storage upon your usage and needs.
